reviewText: Perfect gift for my two year old...she always asks for WW!
The combination of Word World on TV and this set of DVD's and flashcards taught my grandson to read.  At 4 years old he now reads at a kindergarten level, and it all started here.
My 3 year old was given a hand-me-down dvd for her birthday and liked it so I bought the set.

This is my grandaughters favor set of videos.  Happy with purchase except for the fact that the box was in terrible shape when we got it.  Looked like it had been thrown around quite a bit.  But the videos were new so that was what we wanted for my baby girl.
love it! great educational TV time for kids. cards are great for sight words and helped my daughter learn to sound out words.
This is the complete set and a great value for the money.  The Flashcards are very useful for toddlers as well.
WordWorld is like a babysitter who is a teacher.  Kids are so engaged when they watch this show and they are learning at the same time!

word world is a great learnig tv show from pbs, which they have on free tv for u to see before you buy. my daughter of 2 can spell words and read some words that she see's outside like,stop, water,and others.
